comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Evers was the National League MVP (then knows as the Chalmers Award) in 1914. His counterpart in the American League, Eddie Collins, played for the Athletics in the Series that year. www.baseball-reference.com/awards/awards_1914.shtml#NLmvp
